title: Sr. Financial Reporting Accountant
content:
Summary
This position is a senior level position performing various duties related to the financial reporting process for Fidelity & Guaranty Life and subsidiaries.   Areas of responsibility include monthly close responsibilities such as preparation of journal entries, account reconciliations, earnings analysis, and financial statement preparation on a Statutory and GAAP basis including internal/external management and regulatory reporting.  This position will also support the department with respect to internal and external audit requests.
Organization
The Senior Financial Reporting Accountant will report to the Manager, Financial Reporting.  He/she will work with other members of the Financial Reporting team. 
Duties and Responsibilities

Responsible for timely and accurate completion of regulatory required statutory reporting, including the Annual and Quarterly Statements, MD&A, Guaranty Fund exhibits, statutory audited financial statements and any associated filing.
Support coordination and preparation of GAAP, quarterly and annual statements; and related analysis, including, but not limited to related footnotes and analytics.
Prepare analysis and utilize reporting tools to obtain information from the general ledger (Oracle) and/or financial data warehouse as required to assist with the reconciliation and analytic duties related to position.
Preparation of journal entries and account reconciliations including supporting analysis when applicable
Support compliance with internal control procedures and documentation of controls (i.e., Review and approval control binders)
Support internal and external (EY) audits and statutory insurance department examinations, as needed.
Pursue path of continuous process improvement (including automation opportunities) opportunities to identify and provide recommendations.

Experience and Education Requirements

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting
CPA or pursuing CPA Preferred
Big Four experience highly desirable
Minimum 3 years of exp.
Insurance experience a plus.
Public company SEC experience highly desirable

Work Environments
F&G believes in an employee-centric flexible environment, which is why we offer the ability for in-office, hybrid and remote work arrangements. During the hiring process, you'll work with your leader to decide what works best for your role.

About F&G
Since 1959, Fidelity & Guaranty Life Insurance Company (F&G) has offered annuity and life insurance products to those who are seeking security in retirement and protection during life’s unexpected events.
As a national Top Workplace1, an Iowa Top Workplace2 and a proud equal opportunity employer, F&G team members are empowered, collaborative, dynamic and authentic. We believe that by embracing these values, we will continue to build and strengthen the company while continuing to be a great place to work.
